physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Patient A and Patient B presented with palpable thyroid nodules; both were clinically and biochemically euthyroid. Thyroid ultrasound showed multiple complex nodules.

Two months after thyroid surgery, Patient A developed deepening of her voice and increased facial hair. Laboratory evaluation revealed elevated testosterone. MR imaging showed a large pelvic mass and a right renal cyst.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Concern about virilization in Patient A raised after surgery, indicating worsening symptoms.
